data:
1.    Daily, weekly, and monthly missions receive discounts that do not conflict with all the discounts in the station, and are extra mission rewards.

2.    The bonus for all missions is only 1 times the turnover

3.    Daily, weekly, the task reset time is 00:00 Beijing time, and the monthly task starts at 00:00 on the first day of the month and ends at 23:59 on the last day of the month.

4.    Participation in all tasks is calculated automatically. Members need to return to the task center to pick up. If there is no collection or forgot to collect, it will be regarded as abandoning the collection after the next day and cannot be re-issued.

5.    There is no need to participate in order to participate in all tasks. If any task is reached, you can click the receive button.

6.    The part of the task that participates daily is combined with the week and month.

7.    The task cannot be completed within the time, and will be reset after the day. Once you participate, please pay attention to the completion of the day. If the reset is over the time, you will not be able to continue, you need to participate again.

8.    In addition to daily, weekly, and monthly tasks, the company will launch it irregularly or on festive days. Limited tasks, festive tasks, and the requirements reached are calculated without repeating the accumulation of daily, weekly, and monthly task data.

9.    When participating in a task, the company has the right to immediately cancel the current task and receive preferential treatment by inquiring about unreasonable or inappropriate ways to participate in the task.

10. All mission companies have the right to change, stop, cancel offers and have the final interpretation right at any time.
